rules: Rule1: Provided that the chef uses butter in the dish, the show continues.
Rule2: Under the condition that the chef uses oil in the dish, the show continues.
Rule3: If the chef fries the food for the dish, then the dish is not healthy.
Rule4: Whenever the chef deep-fries the dish, the dish is not healthy.
Rule5: Whenever the chef uses sugar in the dish, the chef does not use salt in the dish.
Rule6: Either time expires during the show, or if it is not the case that the chef fries the food for the dish or deep-fries the dish, then the chef steams the food for the dish.
Rule7: Extra time is granted for the show, or time does not expire during the show.
Rule8: If the judge evaluates the dish, then the chef presents the dish to the judge.
Rule9: Under the condition that the chef measures an ingredient precisely, the chef uses sugar in the dish.
Rule10: The chef measures an ingredient precisely, or the chef estimates an ingredient roughly.
Rule11: The chef requests help from an assistant, or if the chef estimates an ingredient roughly, then the chef uses sugar in the dish.
Rule12: Whenever the chef follows the recipe for the dish, then if the dish tastes good, then if the chef does not use sugar in the dish, the chef does not burn the dish.
Rule13: The chef follows the recipe for the dish, or the chef improvises with the dish.
Rule14: The chef wins a prize, or if the chef improvises with the dish, then if the dish tastes good, then if the chef does not use sugar in the dish, the chef does not burn the dish.
Rule15: Whenever the chef adds spice to the dish, it is not the case that the dish's flavor is enhanced.

Rule16: If it is not the case that either the audience applauds during the show or (if it is not the case that adding spice to the dish by the chef leads to enhanced flavor of the dish, then the taste of the dish is ruined), then the judge criticizes the chef.
Rule17: If it is not the case that the chef uses butter in the dish or the chef uses oil in the dish, then the chef uses margarine in the dish.

Rule18: If it is not the case that (if it is not the case that either the audience applauds during the show or (if it is not the case that adding spice to the dish by the chef leads to enhanced flavor of the dish, then the taste of the dish is ruined)) leads to the judge not criticizing the chef, then the chef gets eliminated.

Rule19: Under the condition that it is not the case that (if it is not the case that the chef uses butter in the dish or the chef uses oil in the dish) leads to the chef not using margarine in the dish, the dish is healthy.
Rule20: Provided that the chef does not use sugar in the dish, the judge evaluates the dish.
Rule21: Whenever the chef does not use sugar in the dish, the chef burns the dish.
Rule22: Under the condition that the show does not continue, the chef uses salt in the dish.
Rule23: If the show does not continue, then the chef adds spice to the dish.
facts: Fact2: The taste of the dish is not ruined.
Fact3: The audience does not applaud during the show.
Fact4: The chef does not get eliminated.
Fact5: The chef does not steam the food for the dish.
Fact6: Extra time is not granted for the show.
Fact7: The chef does not present the dish to the judge.
Fact8: The chef does not request help from an assistant.
Fact9: The chef does not win a prize.
